| HistoryText             = Code: Blue was a special division of the [[New York City Police Department (Earth-616)|NYPD]] created by [[Marcus Stone (Earth-616)|Lt. Marc Stone]] to capture super criminals. In their first mission there was a fire in an apartment and a hostage situation. [[Andrew Jackson (Jock) (Earth-616)|Jock Jackson]], a member of Code: Blue, distracted the [[Wrecking Crew (Earth-616)|Wrecking Crew]] to save the hostage. They captured more dangerous criminals and they had excellent tactics and leadership. But one day Code: Blue couldn't help [[Thunderstrike]] in combat against [[Pandara]] and a member, Jock Jackson, sacrificed his life to save him.

They sometimes helped [[Spider-Man]] when he was in danger and fought the [[Beetle]], [[Cadre]], and [[Scorpion]].

|Equipment                = Anti-bullet vests, infrared glasses, helmets, gadgets
